name: Virtual Webinar: The Skills Gap: What Employers Want from Business School Grads
content: Here at QS, we provide prospective graduate and MBA students with support in pursuing higher education! Join us for a free 30-minute webinar exploring The Skills Gap Report and what employers want to see from business school graduates. Unable to attend the live session? Register anyway. A link to a recording of the webinar will be emailed to all registrants. Please note, this is not a scholarship eligible QS event. Time: 9:00 AM - 10:00 AM Price: Free: USD 0.00
